title: Fitness queen Ashy Bines puts luxury Gold Coast house up for rent
text:
FITNESS guru Ashy Bines has put her old home on the rental market, but it will cost thousands each week for the social media influencer to be your landlord.

The six-bedroom Broadbeach Waters property can be rented for an eye-watering $2500 a week, plus a $10,000 bond.

The waterfront mansion features a pool, pontoon, media room and office and is available to rent from October 9.

MORE NEWS: Off-market deals reap big bucks

MORE NEWS: Agents share their most embarrassing moments



However, the property at 15 Cedar Place is still listed for sale, according to property records.

The house first hit the market in August and failed to sell at auction one month later when a price tag of $2.495 million was attached.

It is now listed with an asking price of more than $2.25 million.

The fitness queen, who has more than 830,000 Instagram followers, purchased the property for $1.955 million in 2013, according to CoreLogic.

Ms Bines lived at the home with her husband Steven Evans and son Taj, 3. Earlier this year the family moved into a rental closer to the beach.

“I’m personally someone who likes to move and prefer to rent over own, so I like the variety of having different bedrooms, different locations and just moving and I find it quite exciting,” Ms Bine said in a YouTube vlog earlier this year.

“We found this house … a rental … in the most amazing location … on the Gold Coast … it’s not like right on the beach but it’s a street back.

“We just want to live that lifestyle where every afternoon our routine is to put our feet in the water.”

The rental listing follows Ms Bines slimming down her Mermaid Waters gym from two premises to one.

The gym, called Ashy Bines Transformation Centre, has also shut down its website and membership fees have been slashed.
description: Social media influencer Ashy Bines has put her old home on the rental market, but it will cost thousands each week for the fitness guru to be your landlord.
